TeamworkCommunication LeadershipAbout the TeamThe Retail team is a group of highly motivated, collaborative, and fun professionals across Egypt, looking for a member to add to the department.What equips you for the roleBachelor's degree in Business administration, or any related field.

knowledge of the Leasing market and practices in the local market/international market.
